root.Summary: 1: Ma S, Liu M, Xu Z, Li Y, Guo H, Ge Y, Liu Y, Zheng D, Shi J. A double feedbackloop mediated by microRNA-23a/27a/24-2 regulates M1 versus M2 macrophagepolarization and thus regulates cancer progression. Oncotarget. 2015 Nov 2. doi: 10.18632/oncotarget.6284.
